# Telekinesis
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 9th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 75,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This ring allows the caster to use the spell *[[Telekinesis (Spell)|telekinesis]]* on command.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Telekinesis (Spell)|telekinesis]]*

**Cost** 37,500 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
